channel.title: centos on Developer Playground
channel.description: Recent content in centos on Developer Playground

item.title: Installing and using CentOS 6.10 via Docker
item.description: Pulling and run image in general $ docker run -it --name c6 centos:6.10 bash with sharing filesystem $ docker run -it -v /host/dir:/container/dir --name c6 centos:6.10 bash with binding container ports to the host
